name: Hennessy-Honey Salmon
author: mizzlizzieb
summary: Salmon with a Hennessy-honey sauce. Garnish with lemon and parsley flakes.
ingredients: 2 ⅔ fluid ounces cognac (such as Hennessy)
directions: Coat salmon in lemon and lime juice and place on a baking sheet
Combine garlic, onion powder, Cajun seasoning, and paprika in a small bowl
Heat honey in a small saucepan over medium-low heat until bubbling
Add the garlic mixture and cognac
Simmer until flavors combine and sauce starts to thicken, about 5 minutes
Let cool until thick, 10 to 15 minutes
Coat salmon in olive oil; season with pink salt and pepper
Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler
Spoon the cognac-honey sauce over the salmon
Continue broiling until light brown, 3 to 4 minutes
